description: Creates a new kdb database in the environment.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the kdb database.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A list of key-value pairs to label the kdb database. You can add up to 50 tags to your kdb database (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: databaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the kdb database.

nested_items.name: databaseArn
nested_items.description: The ARN identifier of the database.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment.

nested_items.name: createdTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the database is created in FinSpace. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000000.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The last time that the database was updated in FinSpace. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000000.
